mapper.select: SELECT DAILY_ID, PLAN_ID, WORK_DATE AS actualDate, DAILY_QTY AS actualQty, DEFECT_QTY, REMARK, CREATED_AT AS createdAt FROM PRODUCTION_DAILY WHERE PLAN_ID = #{planId} ORDER BY WORK_DATE DESC, CREATED_AT DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCTION_DAILY ( PLAN_ID, WORK_DATE, DAILY_QTY, DEFECT_QTY, REMARK ) VALUES ( #{planId}, #{actualDate}, #{actualQty}, #{defectQty}, #{remark} )
